Events that occurred on 26 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1923 - J.R.R. Tolkien's review "Holy Maidenhood" is published in The Times Literary Supplement.
1981 - The eighth episode of the 1981 radio series of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
1999 - Fan site TheOneRing.net is created.
2009 - The PC game Third Age: Total War is released.
2010 - Simon Tolkien publishes the article "In My Grandfather's Footsteps".

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2941:
Gandalf visits Bag End looking for somebody to take part in an adventure but Bilbo rejects the offer.
